title: The Ferrokin Origin Part Two
description: After the encounter and escape of the killer known as Jade, the Ferrokin, Jack, Aiden, and Patrick have been forced into hiding. With their resources limited, they do all they can to find out who Jade really is and why she hasnâ€™t killed them yet...With help from physicists, psychologists, biologists, molecular biologists, MDs, chemists, and a former FBI agent, this series is as scientifically sound as a science fiction graphic novel can be. Information about the science used can be found in the back of the book.
author: Jennifer Swartwood-Walker
